mapper.sql: detail_id as detailId, main_id, equi_arch_no, state, inspection_man,remarks,maintain_self,maintain_way
mapper.select: select distinct at_dept as dept_code,c.dept_name from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card b on a.equi_arch_no=b.equi_arch_no left join sys_dept c on c.dept_code=b.at_dept where a.state!='0' and a.state!='1'

select distinct at_dept as dept_code,c.dept_name from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card b on a.equi_arch_no=b.equi_arch_no left join sys_dept c on c.dept_code=b.at_dept where a.state='0'

select distinct at_dept as dept_code,c.dept_name from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card b on a.equi_arch_no=b.equi_arch_no left join sys_dept c on c.dept_code=b.at_dept where a.state='1'

select distinct b.emp_code,b.emp_name from equi_user_maintain a left join sys_user c on c.user_id=a.user_id left join sys_emp b on b.emp_code=c.user_code where a.equi_duty='engineer' and b.dept_code like ( select sd.super_code from sys_emp se left join sys_dept sd on sd.dept_code=se.dept_code where emp_code=#{param1})+'%'
select distinct b.emp_code,a.equi_duty from equi_user_maintain a left join sys_user c on c.user_id=a.user_id left join sys_emp b on b.emp_code=c.user_code where b.emp_code=#{param1}

select a.equi_arch_no,ed.equi_name,ed.equi_spec,ed.equi_model,ed.prim_money,a.remarks from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card ed on a.equi_arch_no=ed.equi_arch_no where ed.at_dept=#{deptCode}
AND a.state=0
AND a.state!=0
AND remarks is null
AND remarks is not null

if exists (select 1 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{param1} and ew.state!='1' ) begin select 0 end else begin update equi_maintain_detail_work set inspection_man=null ,state=0 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{param1} select 1 end

select distinct at_dept as dept_code,c.dept_name, case a.state when 1 then 0 else 1 end state from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card b on a.equi_arch_no=b.equi_arch_no left join sys_dept c on c.dept_code=b.at_dept where a.state!='0'
and inspection_man=#{empCode}
mapper.update: update equi_maintain_detail_work set inspection_man=#{param2} ,state=1 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{param1}
update equi_maintain_detail_work set state=2 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{param1} and inspection_man=#{param2}
mapper.select: if exists (select 1 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{param1} and ew.state!='1' and inspection_man=#{param2}) begin select 0 end else begin update equi_maintain_detail_work set inspection_man=null ,state=0 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{param1} and inspection_man=#{param2} select 1 end

select a.equi_arch_no,ed.equi_name,ed.equi_spec,ed.equi_model,ed.prim_money,a.maintain_self,maintain_way,a.state from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card ed on a.equi_arch_no=ed.equi_arch_no where ed.at_dept=#{deptCode} and inspection_man=#{empCode}
mapper.update: update ew set ew.state=3 from equi_maintain_detail_work ew left join equi_card ec on ec.equi_arch_no=ew.equi_arch_no where ec.at_dept=#{deptCode} and inspection_man=#{empCode} and ew.state=2
mapper.select: select distinct at_dept as dept_code,c.dept_name from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card b on a.equi_arch_no=b.equi_arch_no left join sys_dept c on c.dept_code=b.at_dept where a.state='3' and inspection_man=#{empCode}
select distinct a.state from equi_maintain_detail_work a left join equi_card b on a.equi_arch_no=b.equi_arch_no left join sys_dept c on c.dept_code=b.at_dept where at_dept=#{deptCode}
